info.title: IXA API
info.description: API for interacting with the Redmine server at IXA Colombia. User context is handled through query parameters.

custom_fields.description: User custom fields including availability, department, etc.

api_key.description: User's API key (only visible for current user)

value.description: Field value - can be string, array, number, or boolean depending on field_format

get.description: Returns issues filtered by various parameters including user assignment

parameters.name: subproject_id
parameters.description: Include subprojects (none, !*, any specific project id)

parameters.name: status_id
parameters.description: Filter by status ID (* for all, open, closed, or specific IDs)

parameters.name: assigned_to_id
parameters.description: Filter by assigned user ID (me for current user, or specific user ID)

parameters.name: text_search
parameters.description: Fuzzy text search across subject, description, and notes

parameters.name: subject_fuzzy
parameters.description: Fuzzy search specifically in issue subjects

parameters.name: description_fuzzy
parameters.description: Fuzzy search in descriptions and notes

parameters.name: cf_search
parameters.description: Search within custom fields by field name (supports fuzzy matching)

parameters.name: search_operator
parameters.description: Combine multiple search terms with AND/OR logic

parameters.name: fuzzy_threshold
parameters.description: Fuzzy matching sensitivity for text searches (0=exact, 1=very loose)

post.description: Creates a new issue with specified user context

author_id.description: ID of the user creating the issue

parameters.name: issueId
parameters.description: ID of the issue to retrieve

parameters.name: issueId
parameters.description: ID of the issue to update

parent_issue_id.description: Parent issue ID for subtasks. IMPORTANT: Do not include this field if value is 0 or null - omit entirely to avoid 'parent not valid' errors

notes.description: Comments to add to the issue

private_notes.description: Whether the notes should be private

parameters.name: issueId
parameters.description: ID of the issue to delete

get.description: Returns information about the authenticated user

get.summary: Get all accessible projects (exact matching only)
get.description: Returns list of projects the user has access to. NOTE: Only supports exact matching. For partial/fuzzy search, use /search.json with projects=1

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter projects by exact name match (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: name_partial
parameters.description: Filter projects by partial name/title match (case-insensitive substring search)

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Filter projects by identifier/slug (rarely used - prefer name-based searches)

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: Filter by parent project ID (!* for root projects, * for all including subprojects - DEFAULT: * (always include subprojects))

parameters.name: include_subprojects
parameters.description: Always include subprojects in search results (DEFAULT: true for hierarchical structure)

parameters.name: member_search
parameters.description: Find projects by team member name (fuzzy matching)

parameters.name: fuzzy_threshold
parameters.description: Fuzzy matching sensitivity for text searches (0=exact, 1=very loose)

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific project including subprojects

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID or identifier of the project to retrieve

put.description: Updates project information including custom fields, name, description, and other properties

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID or identifier of the project to update

issue_custom_field_ids.description: Enabled custom field IDs for issues

get.description: Returns list of users and their roles in the project

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: ID or identifier of the project

get.description: Returns list of available issue trackers
Returns list of available issue statuses
Returns list of users available for issue assignment
Returns detailed information about a specific user including custom fields

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve

get.description: Enhanced global search with fuzzy matching, relevance scoring, and intelligent suggestions

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query with intelligent fuzzy matching and typo tolerance

parameters.name: suggest
parameters.description: Include search suggestions for typos and alternatives

highlights.description: Highlighted matching text fragments by field

suggestions.description: Alternative search suggestions for typos or related terms

get.description: Provides real-time search suggestions as user types with context-aware recommendations

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of suggestions to return

id.description: ID of the suggested item (if applicable)

get.description: Universal search endpoint for finding projects, issues, and other content with partial matching support

parameters.name: projects
parameters.description: Include projects in search results (set to 1)

parameters.name: issues
parameters.description: Include issues in search results (set to 1)

parameters.name: all_words
parameters.description: Match all words in query (set to 1)

get.description: Lists predefined queries including ongoing tasks, backlogs, and due date reports
